actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill authorizing appropriations for Peach Corps.

summary.text: Authorizes additional appropriations to carry out the Peace Corps Act for fiscal year 1975. Authorizes the Director of ACTION to transfer to the readjustment allowance, ACTION, account at the Treasury Department from any sums appropriated to carry out the purposes of this Act in fiscal year 1975 not to exceed $315,000 to rectify the imbalance in the Peace Corps readjustment allowance for the period March 1, 1961, to February 28, 1973. Authorizes the Director of ACTION to waive claims resulting from erroneous payments of readjustment allowances to Peace Corps Volunteers who terminated their volunteer service between March 1, 1961, and February 28, 1973.

titles.title: A bill authorizing appropriations for Peach Corps.
